1 James Stroud

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

One of seven Wildcats on the roster to have already earned three letters…His 0.92 career goals against average is tied for second best in Chico State history…Redshirted last season due to injury...Started nine matches in goal in 2011, winning six…Posted six shutouts, tying him for top honors among CCAA goalies…Led the conference in goals against average (0.69)…Third in the CCAA in save percentage (.793)…Pre-Chico Days: A 2009 graduate of San Diego’s Torrey Pines High School...Helped lead the Falcons to back-to-back CIF crowns...Played for the L.A. Galaxy U-18 Academy team in 2008 and 2009…Personal: Born 1/16/91 in Philadelphia, PA...Son of Jim and Joanne...Has two older brothers, Kyle and Ben...Sports hero is for U.S. Men’s National Team goalkeeper Brad Friedel...Non-sports hero is Harry Potter...Biggest sports thrill was NCAA Championships West Regional in 2010...Enjoys surfing, hiking, snowboarding, and other outdoor activities…Best advice ever received: “you can’t succeed if you haven’t failed”…Would like to travel the world...Organizational communications major.
